snippet.title: Warhammer 40,000: Glory in Death - Nokia N-Gage Gameplay
snippet.description:
This took far longer than anticipated! Presenting over 8 hours of raw, unedited footage of Warhammer 40K for the Nokia N-Gage. I really suck at it, so apologies in advance.
Also, the first couple of minutes of the original audio is glitched, but the remaining footage seems to be unaffected. Apologies for the inconvenience!
-- 
The original blurb:
The future is a brutal nightmare. The universe is a dark place, and death is present in its every corner. War is spread across the galaxy, as the battle for survival rages on. Handheld gaming is about to see something new, as Warhammer 40,000 brings all out war to the N-Gage!

Choose your side, and fight for the survival of your race in a turn based war game of legendary proportions. Fight with the Imperium’s Space Marines to guard mankind’s last hope, or reign as the diabolic forces that worship Chaos. Join the mystical Eldar in their woven scheme to bind together the fragile existence of their once mighty race, or lead the Orks in bringing slaughter and mayhem to every corner of the cosmos. Show no mercy, take no prisoners. War is your only source of honour...

The depths of the Warhammer 40,000 Universe hold danger for all living creatures, and the future of your people is in your hands. Can you survive the war long enough to discover the secret of Lya’bru?

Four races to choose from: Orks, Space Marines, Chaos Space Marines and Eldar - each having four different variations
Four interwoven story based campaigns
60 different maps and 5 different environments: ice, industrial, desert, volcanic and jungle
19 different map objectives: e.g. cleanse, hold at all costs, hit and run, breakout, ambush, seek and destroy, bunker assault, assassinate, rearguard, sabotage
Over 20 skirmish maps for practising your leadership skills
Lead your you forces in the top down tactical view
Experience the glorious detail of the Warhammer 40000 universe close up in the combat view
Build your own mix of forces and save them for future battles
Choose from over 50 different squad types made up from over a hundred different unit types from the Warhammer 40000 Universe
Use psychic powers to weaken and destroy your enemies
Unleash monstrous creaturesagainst your foes
In addition to the single player Campaign and Skirmish Mode, Warhammer 40,000 features the following multiplayer options: go against another player using the same game deck with the Hot Seat option, or connect via Bluetooth technology and go head-to-head.

All content uploaded here may be reused freely under the Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported License (CC BY 3.0):
https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
Which means you can freely use our content as long as you credit ngage.arhn.eu so that other users can reach and use our resources.
